body.name: ASRock X570 Steel Legend WiFi AX AM4 AMD X570 SATA 6GB/S ATX AMD Motherboard
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
features: Supports AMD AM4 socket Ryzen 2000 and 3000 Series processors
body.description: Steel legend represents the philosophical state of rock-solid durability and irresistible aesthetics. Built around most demanding specs and features, the steel legend series aims at daily users and mainstream enthusiasts! Providing a strong array of materials/components to ensure a stable and reliable performance. A motherboard that fulfills every task – with style!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 189 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Compatible Processors
productInformation.value: AMD Ryzen 2000 Series, AMD Ryzen 3000 Series

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working great with some great features.
reviews.reviewText: This board works great, and components seem very fast in my budget build. The support site is easy to navigate and find updated drivers. Updating the bios was fairly easy to do, and explained well on the support site. It worked right out of the box with my Ryzen 5700G.The only, minor, criticism is that the lighting sync software is a Windows application, so on boot up, my RAM chips do not sync until the application is started. This is really only noticeable when my son boots into his account before I load into mine. It might be a bit better were that set up as a bios setting, tunable through the MB app, like it was on my old MB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this board so much I bought 2 of them. No problems sturdy PCI slots multiple m.2 drives. Whats not to like. Now that the price dropped its a steal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My first Server build
reviews.reviewText: In spite of my aprehensions, using this board for my first ever server build went perfectly. I had memory issues at first (my bad - I bought the wrong parts) - the board told me. Not ultra-clearly, but it told me. I bought new ram and boom - it all worked. :-)What I like: 8 SATA ports, fancy LED's that give a visual impact, M.2's with heat sinks.What I did not like:-1. Lack of USB C port for my case front (so I bought a header for a few bucks and it works'ish - not full USB C but at least it saves me having a dead port - see pic for more details); and2. Lack of linux software to play with RGB settings.They are my only gripes, and with my header-to-USB-C adapter, it made neither issue a big deal.Great board. It just WORKED for me with my 3900X CPU, 64GB of ram, seven IronWolf 6TB disks and two NVMe drives. I used this in a Fractal Define 7 case and everything was in the right place for me cable wise. I love the end result. I like and recommend this mobo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars well made and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This was my first computer build in 15 years, and I was nervous about it; fear of complications, wrong parts and broken pins. Before installing the board and putting parts on it, I watched a couple of youtube videos on "how to put together your first computer", read the good directions that came with this motherboard and took my time. When I got it assembled, without mishap, and plugged into a monitor and the wall, it worked!In my attached photo, you can see the motherboard inside the very nice NXZT 510 case (which I loved). I got good advice and used "pcpartpicker.com", a program that matches cases, motherboards, CPUs, coolers and video cards; all to make sure that they are compatible and will fit inside the case (not trivial). I would recommend you install the video card after everything else because I needed to install the SSD drive card underneath where the video card rested.My only complaint was there was no USB header (port on the board) for a type C connection to a front port on the case. When I sought help from ASRock, after having to put everything relevant in an email, I received back word that the board did not have the correct header port. I solved it eventually with a conversion insert for the board that I found without ASRock's help. For me this was pretty trivial, but with the rapid pace of changes in computer accessory connections, it is likely that others will want a USB type c connection on the front of their computer.Aesthetically, I found all the little LED lights that blink on the motherboard silly, but cute and eventually I might convert to a geek who likes all the lights. I like the full size of this motherboard, it made installing the video card (or larger CPU coolers possible and allowed someone like me with fat fingers to get fan connectors inserted without breaking off components.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a beast of a motherboard. Works great with my Ryzen 7 5800x3d.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUILD YOUR GAMING PC UNLESS MOTHER BOARD HAS ALL SCREWS!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this back in June of this year and didn’t finish it building until the ending of June. The motherboard did not bring all necessary screws to keep it in place but it was my mistake to think anything nothing would happen if it was just in place! The motherboard had a malfunction and it fried it making it stick to my pc case. It wouldn’t boot up or make the beeping sound to know where the problem was. Please be careful when buying this product and make sure you open it to see if it has all screws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks awsome works as it should!
reviews.reviewText: Went in easy, looks really good. One down side is a few scuffs and smudges but other then that I would buy again
Cumple su función, volveré a comprar

reviews.reviewTitle: Bonita, pero incompatible con lo que dice ser compatible.
reviews.reviewText: Compre esta tarjeta esperando que funcionara correctamente con la tarjeta de video, AMD CPU y RAM que en la pagina de especificaciones dice que es compatible. No solamente no es cierto, si no que omitieron varios detalles sobre los CPUs con los que no es compatible.Eviten esta marca, a menos que sepan los modelos exactos con los que si funcionan. El que chip diga que el BIOS es 3.3 no significa que vaya a poder reconocer el AMD CPU de la generacion que se supone que es compatible.Edit: Resulta que Asrock dio informacion falsa sobre esta MB. De preferencia estudien bien sus opciones, las especificaciones en su pagina son falsas.
